product_cover.name: Crispy Honey-Garlic Chicken
product_cover.description: Our crispiest and juiciest chicken yet! Made from premium NON-GMO pasture-raised chicken and brushed with our delectable honey-garlic glaze, this is something your tastebuds wouldn't want to miss.

products_featured.name: Tornado Fries
products_featured.description: Our classic fries with a delicious and clever twist!

customer_reviews.name: Susanne Peters
customer_reviews.comment: The food here's affordable, delicious, and just keeps making me go back for more! Definitely one of my favorite restaurants.

customer_reviews.name: Jennifer Green
customer_reviews.comment: Not only is the food amazing, but so are the staff! They're so hospitable and welcoming, like one big happy family!
